titles.title: Jonathan Tomal Rare Diseases Public Information Act
To amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for the establishment through the National Institutes of Health of a data system and an information clearing-house with respect to rare diseases.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1796-1797)

bill.summary: 7/15/1993--Introduced. Jonathan Tomal Rare Diseases Public Information Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to establish: (1) the National Rare Diseases Data System for the collection, storage, analysis, retrieval, and dissemination of data from patient populations with rare health conditions; and (2) the National Rare Diseases Information Clearinghouse. Authorizes appropriations.
